column5: Card Description
A basic form of wood-element magic. Negates enemy attacks with air pressure and pushes the opponent back\, opening some distance between you.
A basic form of metal-element magic. Uses the metal element to create sharp blades and manipulate them to rush at the opponent. They\'re not very powerful\, but make up for it in number.
A basic form of earth-element magic. Crystal spears erupt from the ground and rain down on the opponent from the sky.
A basic form of fire-element magic. Shoots a large fireball straight ahead. Superb in penetration\, damage\, and ease of use\, but as it travels straight\, it\'s also easy to dodge.
A basic form of water-element magic. Summons a waterway at the enemy\'s feet and attacks with a high-pressure water spout.
A special form of fire-element magic. Sends flames in a great arc\, focusing not on power but on spread. It\'s not terribly powerful\, but dodging it requires lots of movement.

A form of water-element magic specialized for defense. A bubble shield that stops enemy attacks. It bursts after taking a certain amount of damage\, but that can deal damage back as a sort of counter.

A form of wood-element magic specialized for offense. Creates a shot of high pressure air and throws it at the opponent. Its high speed makes it hard for those in the line of fire to even avert their eyes.

A defensively specialized form of earth-element magic. Creates a wall of crystal from the earth and sends the opponent flying. Useful as a counterattack as it has invincible frames and a wide attack area.
A physical manifestation of fire magic. Lashes fire at the enemy like a whip. Even though she has no strength\, and the fire has no mass\, it is still incredibly strong.
A restraint device created from water magic. Sprays non-damaging bubbles which trap the enemy in mid-air. The bubbles can not be blocked\, but won\'t have much of an effect unless they all hit.
An offensively specialized form of metal-element magic. Gathers the metal element to create a circular saw blade\, which is thrown at the enemy. When thrown both up and down it\'s easy to hit with.
Anti-air wood magic. Balls of lightning appear from her hands\, shoot upward and explode. Because the basis of this attack is wood magic\, it seems that it could be more stable.
A shapeshifting metal attack. Creates a sword from metal\, then throws it towards the enemy. She can also wield the sword while moving by holding down the button.

A resistance technique derived from earth magic. The body becomes hard for a while\, and can deflect one attack. Defense and attack can get a bit crazy after this move\, since she can take a lot of damage.
Synthesis of fire and metal. Create a mass with high density and temperature. Strikes the ground and creates a pillar of flame from the enemy\'s feet. It\'s easy to misstep.
Synthesis of earth and water. Spray compressed water shots forward at low cost; effective in a firefight.
Synthesis of metal and wood. Protects the user with a gear-shaped blade. A defensive spell that can intercept nearby enemies.
Creates a protective bubble shield. The bubble stops enemy attacks. The user is invincible while the bubble exists\, but because you can\'t graze\, it\'s hard to maintain it for long.
Creates a small sun which burns everything with its light. One of her greatest spells. Destiny- defying magic of the Vampires\' mansion.
Magic from the surrounding area gathers together and heals her. As her spirit replenishes\, the benevolent light will follow Patchy around.
Condenses moonlight into arrows of light\, shooting through everything in its magic field. Magic that protects Patchouli like an impregnable fortress.
Releases fuses up and down to the ceiling and floor. They have no power until lit with a fire attack\, but can be used on ground or in mid-air\, and the coverage is quite large.
Elemental magic amplifier. When using a special attack\, the gems increase its power. Continues with the passage of time.
Jeweled pillars rise from the earth and impale the opponent in succession. The speed of this card is quite slow\, but the player can exploit this to keep the opponent suppressed for a long time.
Independent attack from above. Light shots move upwards in a spiral shape while scattering attacks downwards.
Whirlpools of light form and attack from the side. They are individually weak\, but since they come in succession and have a long duration\, it can overwhelm the opponent.
